data.text: Nguluwi kangwinuka na wang'honyo wa heye wangusambaluka,
Kota iyosi vyolilinguwembeluswa na mbeho, ndo vyoyalinguwawembelusa,
Ila watanganiche wangusangalala hali Nguluwi,
Mumwimbile Nguluwi, mlitogole itagwa lya heye,
Nguluwi yalingikala honhu ha heye helile,
Nguluwi kanguwahilula waliyeka leka wawe na ivyazi lya hewo,
Gwa Nguluwi, louwalongole wanhu wa hegwe,
isi naikakama, ulanga naulagaza nhonya ng'hulu,
Gwa Nguluwi, nakuitowela isi nhonya nyinji,
Wanhu wa hegwe nawapata amo honhu ha kikala,
Mkulu nakalavya mzilo,
“Wandewa na wamizi wa hewo wangudwina vibi.”
hanga hewo nawapona kuli kambi,
Nguluwi Yawele na Ludali vyoyawasambalule wandewa ako,
Chidunda cha Bashani ndo chidunda cha chikulu,
lekachoni kwanguchonela fihi,
Mituka ja Nguluwi ndo makumi elufu,
Nakukwina kuchanya, nakuhola wapogozi wa ngondo,
Mkulu Nguluwi yatogoligwe mazuwa gose.
Nguluwi wa hetwe ndo Nguluwi yawele kangutuloholaga,
Nguluwi kovihondanga vitwi vya wang'honyo wa heye,
Mkulu nakalonga, “Ndowahilula wang'honyo kulawa Bashani,
ubije kuli danda ya wang'honyo wa hewo,
Gwa Nguluwi, majendo ga hegwe ga kusumya goneche,
Kumwando walingwimba, kumbele walingutowa vinhu vya muziki,
Mumtogole Nguluwi kuli vilundo vikulu vya wanhu.
Mwaluko ndo Benjamini, mdodo wa weng'ha,
Gwa Nguluwi, ulajile ludali lwa hegwe,
kulawa kuli ng'handa ya hegwe, Yelusalemu,
Uling'hanuchile lila igongolo lilingikala milamba, Misili,
Vinhu vya shaba vyokuya kulawa Misili,
Hemwe wandewa wa isi, mumwimbile Nguluwi,
mumwimbile heye yalingwendesa kuli ulanga,
Muwikule kuwala ludali lukulu lwa Nguluwi,
Gwa Nguluwi, hegwe ndo wa kukabusa kuli honhu ha hegwe helile.
